attributes.action: Re-open empty Army Barracks for Homeless Ex Servicemen
attributes.additional_details: No one who served for our country deserves to be failed by the system
attributes.background: There are homeless ex-servicemen on our streets. Army Barracks are sitting empty not being used! If they open them, they will have a roof over there head somewhere safe to sleep, they can maintain the upkeep and anyone suffering from stress disorder can help each other.
